title: kunru tOrADum
sahitya:
kunru tOrADum guhaik-kaDalE manam kuLirap-pozhiginra aruT-punalE


anupallavi

  manru tOrum mANikka jyOtiyin mangala dIpamE shenkadir vElanE


caraNam    uvamaikk-aDangAda uraiyinukk-eTTAda Unak-kaN ariyAda jnAnak-kaNNoLiyE
kAntA shuddhAnandA Om kArtikEyA gAngEyA kalApa mayil vEl murugA murugA murugA murugA
